h2_title: Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide
content: Once she reaches about half of her health or less, you'll need to keep your eyes peeled for when she dives her head into the ground. This will leave only her rear abdomen sticking out of the ground, but resist the urge to smack at it. Zhu Bajie may try to warn you, but it may not come out in time that she's preparing a deadly poison explosion!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Spider.md', within the main section titled 'Violet Spider', specifically from the subsection 'Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once she reaches about half of her health or less, you'll need to keep your eyes peeled for when she dives her head into the ground. This will leave only her rear abdomen sticking out of the ground, but resist the urge to smack at it. Zhu Bajie may try to warn you, but it may not come out in time that she's preparing a deadly poison explosion!
